summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1882, for the improvement of East Newton Street, from Eastlake Avenue to Boylston Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage,, under Ordinance No. 19550 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
